message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $18,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider this price?

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. While $18,000 is my ideal price, I'm willing to come down to $16,500. This feels like a fair compromise that reflects the true worth of what I'm offering.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $15,500 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
